description: OFFICIAL COURT TRANSCRIPT OF PROCEEDINGS FILED Evidentiary hearing, Day 1. held on October 21, 2020 before Judge Marco A. Hernandez, Court Reporter Nancy M. Transcript may be viewed at Court's public terminal or purchased from the Court Reporter/ before the deadline for Release of Transcript Restriction.
